tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive drug information including contraindications, dosing guidelines, and therapeutic categories from medical databases.

drug_name.description: Name of the drug (generic or brand name)

include_interactions.description: Whether to include drug interaction information

error_messages: Drug not found: The specified drug name is not recognized in the database. Check spelling or try alternative names.
Database connection error: Unable to access drug information database. Verify network connectivity.
Invalid drug name format: Drug name contains invalid characters or is improperly formatted.
usage: Provide the drug_name to get comprehensive information. Set include_interactions to false if interaction data is not needed.

brand_names.description: List of brand names for this drug

contraindications.description: Medical conditions where this drug should not be used
